data.title: Page 4
data.text:
Clock House releasing “Blueberry Jalapeno Sizzler” sour today! (5/24)

Blueberry Jalapeño Sizzler is a kettle sour brewed with sweet blueberries and loads of jalapeños. Expect big juicy blueberry notes with jalapeño flavors throughout. Sizzle level= med for maximum enjoyment. Available on draft, and in 16oz 4-packs!

Humble Forager beers, seltzers, and cocktAles on their way to Iowa from Abu Nawas!

HUMBLE FORAGER MIXED PACKS:

Humble Forager Humble Bumble Mixed Pack 2/12/12oz Sleek CANS – Brand New Bumble Buzzed Seltzers Mixed 12 Pack (2/cs) Featuring:

Humble Bumble v1: Citrus. 5% ABV – MN

Humble Bumble v3: Mango Piña Colada. 5% ABV – MN

Humble Bumble v8: Pineapple Cherry. 5% ABV – MN *New to the Mixed Pack*

Humble Bumble v9: Pomberry. 5% ABV – MN

Humble Forager Enchanted Island Mixed Pack 4/6/12oz Sleek CANS – CocktAle Inspired Delicious concoctions 6 Pack (4/cs) Featuring

Enchanted Island (v1) Painkiller: Pineapple, Coconut, Orange, Nutmeg. VEGAN 9% ABV – MN

Enchanted Island (v2) Jamaican Punch: Passionfruit, Tangerine, Cranberry, Lime, Pomegranate Simple Syrup, Coconut. VEGAN 9% ABV – MN

*BRAND NEW* Enchanted Island (v7) Lava Flow: Pineapple, Coconut, Strawberry, Banana. VEGAN 9% ABV – MN

Humble Forager Coastal Fruited Mixed Pack 4/6/12oz Sleek CANS – Intensely Fruited sours like you’ve never had before. 6 Pack (4/cs) Featuring:

Coastal Sunrise (v1). Fruited Breakfast Pastry Sour w/ Blueberry, Maple Syrup, Vanilla, Cinnamon. VEGAN 6% ABV – MN

Coastal Sunshine (v4): Fruited Sour w/ Passionfruit, Mango, Pink Guava. VEGAN 6% ABV – MN

Coastal Sunset (v7): Fruited Pastry Sour w/ Mango, Coconut, Madagascar Vanilla beans, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar. VEGAN 6% ABV – MN

HUMBLE FORAGER CANS:

Humble Forager PinSeeker Pilsner 4/6/16oz CANS – PinSeeker Crisp Pilsner is meant to be enjoyed with your longtime friends, new acquaintances and cherished loved ones. 4.2% ABV – MN

Humble Forager Hook Setter Amber 4/6/16oz CANS – Whether you are playing on the water, relaxing after a day of work, or just in need of delicious refreshing beer, Hook Setter Amber Lager has your back. Brewed with the highest quality German malts and Czech hops before cold lagering, the old-fashioned way for 6 weeks. Don’t rush through life moments, enjoy the ride with a Hook Setter by your side. 100% VEGAN. 5% – ABV – MN

Humble Forager Elevated Perspective DDH DIPA 6/4/16oz CANS – DDH DIPA Packed with Nelson Sauvin and Citra hops, this new brew is a Hazy IPA lover’s dream! 8% ABV – MN

Clock House releasing “Say Something Sour” collab w/ Foundation 2 today! (5/17)

We’re excited to announce Say Something Sour will be returning back into our taproom this Friday, May 17th at noon!

This beer is a collaboration brew with our good friends at Foundation 2 Crisis services.

Foundation 2 is a Cedar Rapids based mental health and suicide prevention non-profit. Together we brewed up a fruited sour with strawberry and orange purée to help spread awareness about mental health and encourage others to stand up and say something. Expect flavors of Strawberry Soda and Hi-C Orange Lavaburst!

This will be available in 16oz 4-packs, growlers, and on draft!

Who’s ready for more Hop Butcher from Abu Nawas!

HOP BUTCHER FOR THE WORLD:

HOP BUTCHER Super Megabite 6/4/16oz CANS – Triple India Pale Ale with Citra, Amarillo. 10.5% ABV – IL

HOP BUTCHER Grid 6/4/16oz CANS – American Pale Ale with Citra & Mosaic. 5.75% ABV – IL

HOP BUTCHER Thoroughly New 6/4/16oz CANS – India Pale Ale with Chinook, Citra, Mosaic & Strata. 6.5% ABV – IL

HOP BUTCHER Mobula 6/4/16oz CANS – Imperial Stout Brewed w/ Chocolate, Coconut & Almonds. 10.5% ABV – IL

Abomination, Fat Orange Cat, and Two Villians coming from Abu Nawas!

FAT ORANGE CAT CANS:

Fat Orange Cat FOC Baby Kiwis 6/4/16oz CANS – New England IPA Brewed and Dry Hopped with Exclusively New Zealand Hops. Motueka, Nelson, Riwaka, and Wai-iti. 7.5% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Box of Raining Cats 6/4/16oz CANS – New England IPA Brewed and Dry Hopped with Citra & Nelson. 7% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Baby Kittens GALAXY 6/4/16oz CANS – Baby Kittens with Galaxy Hops. Hazy New England IPA. 6.5% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Baby Kittens 6/4/16oz CANS – Lovely Hazy New England IPA. with a tiny hint of sweetness on the nose. Up front we find a relaxed medley of fresh citrus, mangos, and pineapple. It finishes with a hint of pine and invigorating grapefruit with just enough bitterness to cleanse your palette and invite you back for another sip. 6.5% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat Hazed and Confused Teenage Kittens 6/4/16oz CANS – A Dank, Hazy IPA with Citra, Mosaic, and Columbus. 7.1% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Traffic Lights Turn Blue Tomorrow 6/4/16oz CANS – DOUBLE NE IPA. The combination of Citra, Mosaic and Eureka hops creates a grapefruit/citrus flavor profile in this hazy, creamy and fruity Double IPA with a dry and refreshing finish. 8.5% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC You Had Me At Meow 6/4/16oz CANS – Sour Ale with Papaya, Tahitian Lime, & Alphonso Mango⁠. 5.7% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Someone In My Head STRATA 6/4/16oz CANS – Double Dry-Hopped with Strata. 8.75% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Severe Tire Damage 6/4/16oz CAN – Hazy Double IPA. 8.0% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC You Had Me At Meow 6/4/16oz CANS – Sour Ale with Papaya, Tahitian Lime, & Alphonso Mango⁠. 5.7% ABV – CT

Fat Orange Cat FOC Purrkatory (Mexican Blend) 6/4/16oz CANS – Imperial Milk Stout with Single-Origin Mexican Coffee!⁠ 11% ABV – CT

Skygazer / Fat Orange Cat FOC Floofer 6/4/16oz CANS – Imperial Milk Stout with Banana, Cacao Nibs, and Marshmallow. 10% ABV – CT

ABOMINATION BREWING CANS:

Abomination Lil Foggy 6/4/12oz CANS – Double Dry Hopped IPA with Mosaic, Citra, Pacific Jade, Summit & Nelson Hops. 4.5% ABV – CT

Abomination Brewing Everyday Fog 6/4/16oz CANS – Double Dry Hopped Double IPA with Mosaic, Pacific Jade, Citra, Summit & Enigma NE Hazy IPA – ABV 7.1% – CT

Abomination Brewing Zombie Fog 6/4/16oz CANS – An absurdly Dank & Juicy Triple IPA brewed in collaboration with Beer Zombies Brewing. 10.6% ABV – CT Deceivingly Crushable!

Abomination Rotting Earth 6/4/16oz CANS – QUADRUPLE Dry Hopped DIPA brewed with Nelson, Mosaic, Ariana, Pacific Jade, Motueka & Citra. 9.3% ABV – CT

Abomination Brewing Love Letters From Hell 6/4/16oz CANS – Milkshake Style Triple IPA with candy hearts, sprinkles, marshmallows, milk sugar, vanilla bean, strawberry & ice cream. 9.6% ABV – CT

Abomination Brewing Wandering into the Fog TDH SIMCOE 6/4/16oz CANS – Triple Dry Hopped Double IPA with SIMCOE. 8.6% ABV – CT

Abomination Brewing Wandering into the Fog TDH VISTA 6/4/16oz CANS – Triple Dry Hopped Double IPA with VISTA. 8.6% ABV – CT

Abomination Luscious V2 – Double Fruited – Banana + Strawberry 6/4/16oz CANS – Banana, Strawberry, & Blueberry Smoothie seltzer. 5.5% ABV – CT

TWO VILLAINS CANS:

Two Villains CRAWLING OUT OF THE FOG 6/4/16oz CANS – An ABOMINATION BREWING COLLAB. NE DIPA Double Dry-Hopped with Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe, and Nelson Sauvin. Tasting Notes: Dank/Citrus/White Wine/Stone Fruit 8.5% ABV – NJ

Two Villains DOOMSDAY 6/4/16oz CANS – NE IPA with Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe. Delightfully Crushable. 6.5% ABV – NJ

Two Villains THAT SPLASH AGAINST MY HOLLOW BONES 6/4/16oz CANS – Wu-Tang inspired NE IPA with Citra, Cashmere, & Azacca. 7% ABV – NJ

Two Villains SPECIAL HERBS: EL DORADO 6/4/16oz CANS – NE DIPA brewed with Single Hop. El Dorado. 8% ABV – NJ

Two Villains VILLAINS NEVER DIE (CARA CARA ORANGE/PEACH) 6/4/16oz CANS – Wu-Tang inspired Intensely Fruited Sour conditioned on Cara Cara Orange, Peach and Marshmallow. 5.5% ABV – NJ

Two Villains RATIONAL GAZE 6/4/16oz CANS – Imperial Stout brewed with Maple Syrup, Coffee, & Vanilla. Autodidact Collab. 10.5% ABV – NJ

Hubbard’s Cave coming from Abu Nawas!

Hubbard’s Cave CANS:

Hubbard’s Cave SPELUNKER SNACK 6/4/16oz CANS – Hazy Imperial IPA w/ Citra and Newzilla Hops. 8.5% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave FRESH IPA 6/4/16oz CANS – Hazy IPA w/ Simcoe Hops. 7% ABV – IL *Packaged Fresh to Order*

Hubbard’s Cave HOPSURD 6/4/16oz CANS – Hazy Imperial IIPA w/ Citrusy hop blend. 8.5% ABV – IL *Packaged Fresh to Order*

Hubbard’s Cave FRESH IIPA ONE HOP CITRA 6/4/16oz CANS – Hazy Imperial IPA with exclusively CITRA HOPS. 8.5% ABV – IL *Packaged Fresh to Order*

Hubbard’s Cave CALM CLASSROOM 6/4/16oz CANS – West-coast Style IPA. 7% ABV – IL *Packaged Fresh to Order*

Hubbard’s Cave MILK OF THE MURDER HORNET (Blueberry) 6/4/16oz CANS – Milkshake Imperial IPA with Blueberry, Vanilla, and Lactose. 8.5% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave MILK OF THE MURDER HORNET (Orange) 6/4/16oz CANS – Milkshake Imperial IPA with Orange, Vanilla, and Lactose. 8.5% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave VANILLA SKYLINE 12/2/16oz CAN (2-Pack) – Imperial Stout w/ Vanilla Beans. 12% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave FRENCH TOAST 12/2/16oz CANS (2 Pack) – Imperial Stout with Cinnamon, Maple Syrup, Vanilla Beans, and Lactose. 12% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave EL ZACATON 12/2/16oz CANS (2 Pack) – Imperial Stout w/ Almond Flour, Chocolate, Cinnamon, Vanilla, and Chiles. 12% ABV – IL

Hubbard’s Cave ACCIDENT IN HUBBARD’S CAVE 12/2/16oz CANS (2 Pack) – The Imperial Stout that started the HC legend. 12% ABV – IL

BARREL AGED Hubbard’s Cave CANS:

Hubbard’s Cave Barrel Aged ME LOVE TO EAT OREO COOKIES 12/2/16oz CANS (2 Pack) – Bourbon Barrel Aged Imperial Stout with Chocolate Cream Filled Cookies, Vanilla Beans and Lactose. 13% ABV – IL

Field Day Brewing releasing Part 1 of their “Conspiracy” series! “Moon Landing” hazy double IPA releases this Friday! (5/10)

Courtesy of Field Day Brewing’s Facebook page:

ℂ𝕠𝕟𝕤𝕡𝕚𝕣𝕒𝕔𝕪 𝕊𝕖𝕣𝕚𝕖𝕤! Landing at Field Day THIS FRIDAY MAY 10TH!

MOON LANDING HAZY IPA! This Double IPA is hopped with Simcoe, Citra, and experimental hop HBC586. This is the first of 3 beers in our Conspiracy Series.. each of which will feature an experimental hop and of course a conspiracy theory! Be sure to collect all 3 cans and look out for the release of the next!

Urban Chestnut brews coming from Abu Nawas!

URBAN CHESTNUT BREWING CO.

URBAN CHESTNUT SAMPLER 3/8/16oz CANS – No new brands, no trendy styles…. Just a convenient sampler pack, that features some of your local favorites, and pays homage to the City that was built on Lager biers Each pack includes: 2 x Old Maibock Lager 2 x Stammtisch German Pilsner 2 x Dorfbier Bavarian Dunkel 2 x Zwickel Bavarian Lager

URBAN CHESTNUT ZWICKEL LIGHT 4/6/12oz CANS – Light Bavarian Lager. You Asked, They Delivered. All the deliciousness of Zwickel w/ 95 Calories, 3.7 Carbs, 4.0% ABV, and priced to compete with the big boys.

URBAN CHESTNUT HOP WATER ORANGE 6/4/16oz CANS – Infused with natural Orange flavor and American hops, UC Orange Sparkling Hop Water is unsweetened and naturally free of both Alcohol and Calories. 0% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT HOP WATER GRAPEFRUIT 6/4/16oz CANS – Infused with natural Grapefruit flavor and American hops, UC Grapefruit Sparkling Hop Water is unsweetened and naturally free of both Alcohol and Calories. 0% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT PASTARIA 6/4/16oz CANS – Italian Pilsner ala UC. Moderate carbonation with a crisp, clean finish makes this a great beer to pair with your favorite pizza or pasta! 5.3 ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT BALKAN 6/4/16oz CANS – Balkan Helles Lager. This classic Helles Lager was brewed in collaboration with Balkan Treat Box and features notes of bread and a medium low hop bitterness along with a floral, spicy hop aroma. 4.8% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT Big Shark Tangerine Radler 6/4/16oz CANS – Tangerine Radler. In German, “Radler” means: cyclist and it also means: Bier-mixed-with-soda. Thirst quenching and exactly what you need for a warmer day! 4.2% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT Prickly Pear Ku’damm 6/4/16oz CANS – Prickly Pear Berliner Weisse. Prickly Pear Berliner Weisse is pale gold and hazy with clean, lemon-like tartness, light body and light doughy-ness. 4.2% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT ZWICKEL 6/4/16oz BOTTLES – On Premise accounts have been seeing a lot of success with this Bottle Format, and we couldn’t be more thrilled about this classy presentation. Bavarian Lager. Pronounced ‘zv-ick-el’, the flagship lager of Urban Chestnut. It is an unfiltered, unpasteurized, German classic that finishes as a smooth-drinking, naturally cloudy bier. 5% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT ZWICKEL 6/4/16oz CANS – Bavarian Lager. Pronounced ‘zv-ick-el’, the flagship lager of Urban Chestnut. It is an unfiltered, unpasteurized, German classic that finishes as a smooth-drinking, naturally cloudy bier. 5% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT DORFBIER 6/4/16oz BOTTLES – On Premise accounts have been seeing a lot of success with this Bottle Format, and we couldn’t be more thrilled about this classy presentation. Munich Dunkel. Some refer to the Dunkel style as the original bier of Munich and its surrounding villages (Dörfer). This everyday bier ranges in color and sweetness depending on the amount of Munich and roasted malts used. The sweetness of the malt is then balanced by the use of another Bavarian friend…the Hallertau hop…in this specific case, Hersbrucker, grown near Wolnzach, Hallertau. 5.2% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT DORFBIER 6/4/16oz CANS – Munich Dunkel. Some refer to the Dunkel style as the original bier of Munich and its surrounding villages (Dörfer). This everyday bier ranges in color and sweetness depending on the amount of Munich and roasted malts used. The sweetness of the malt is then balanced by the use of another Bavarian friend…the Hallertau hop…in this specific case, Hersbrucker, grown near Wolnzach, Hallertau. 5.2% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT STAMMTISCH 6/4/16oz CANS – German Pilsner. A “Stammtisch” is an informal group meeting held on a regular basis – more directly translating to ‘table for regulars’. Our Stammtisch was brewed to celebrate this idea of community and socializing. It’s a traditional German Pilsner featuring a blend of Hallertau and Strisselspalt hops, giving it a pronounced herbal and spicy aroma. It’s crisp and dry with a light grainy malt profile. We think it’s the perfect accompaniment to any gathering. 5.4% ABV – MO

URBAN CHESTNUT SCHNICKELFRITZ 6/4/16oz CANS – Bavarian Weissbier. The unmistakable characteristics of this Bavarian Weissbier are achieved with a yeast that is decidedly fruity and phenolic. You may note clove, nutmeg or even vanilla and/or banana-like aromas and flavors. 5% ABV – MO

Clock House “Low Bandito” imperial stout returns today! (5/3)

Courtesy of Clock House Brewing’s Facebook:

Coming in hot! Low Bandito is back!

This Imperial Stout was boiled for over 14 hours and later rested in Añejo tequila barrels for one year. Habanero peppers, limes, cacao nibs, vanilla beans, and cinnamon were added in the secondary to pull massive flavors of Mexican chocolate.

This will be available in 500 ML bottles and on draft! $22 per 500 ML bottle. No limits.
